add_song_help:
Please enter notes using the Middle C (C4 or câ€²) as base for the octave notation. If a note is below the Middle C, it needs to specify 0 as octave. Everything starting at the High C (C5 or câ€²â€²) needs to specify a 2 as octave.

Notes must be separated by spaces. Special characters can be used for formatting (e.g., bar line with '|' or new line).

Example with Drunken Sailor:
